commands.name: add
commands.description: Adds content to a file depending on subcommands.

subcommands.name: customUI
subcommands.description: Inserts or creates a customUI in specified excel file.

arguments.name: excel-file-name
arguments.description: Excel file name to insert the customUI. (If only a file name is specified then the project path will be considered)

arguments.name: customui-file-name
arguments.description: CustomUI file name to insert the customUI. (If only a file name is specified then the project path will be considered)

commands.name: generate
commands.description: Generates content for the project depending on subcommands.

subcommands.name: excel-file
subcommands.description: Creates an excel file with a customUI within it.

arguments.name: excel-file-name
arguments.description: Excel file name to create. (If only a file name is specified then the project path will be considered)
